00306 inline 
00307 RoutingNode::RoutingNode(bool dummy)
00308 {
00309    m_forwardConn = NULL;
00310    m_backwardConn = NULL;
00311    m_lineID = 0; // Must zero this one.
00312    
00313    m_infinity    = MAX_UINT8;
00314    m_restriction = ItemTypes::noRestrictions;
00315    //reset(NULL);
00316 }

00318 inline void
00319 RoutingNode::reset(RoutingMap* theMap)
00320 {
00321    // These will become nothing if FILE_DEBUGGING is off.
00322 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00323    FileDebugCalcRoute::writeCostToFile('R',
00324                                        m_itemID,
00325                                        m_cost,
00326                                        MAX_UINT32,
00327                                        true,
00328                                        m_dest,
00329                                        "Resetting");
00330    FileDebugCalcRoute::writeCostToFile('R',
00331                                        m_itemID,
00332                                        m_estimatedCost,
00333                                        MAX_UINT32,
00334                                        false,
00335                                        m_dest,
00336                                        "Resetting");
00337 #endif
00338    m_cost          = MAX_UINT32;
00339    m_estimatedCost = MAX_UINT32;
00340    m_gradient      = NULL;
00341    m_dest          = false;
00342    m_isVisited     = false;
00343 
00344    m_infinity = theMap->getInfinity();
00345    
00346 }

00375 inline uint32
00376 RoutingNode::getRealCost(const RoutingMap* theMap) const
00377 {
00378    if ( theMap->getInfinity() == m_infinity ) {
00379       return m_cost;
00380    } else {
00381       return MAX_UINT32;
00382    }
00383 }

00385 inline void
00386 RoutingNode::setRealCost( RoutingMap* theMap, uint32 cost )
00387 {
00388 #ifdef FILE_DEBUGGING
00389    // DEBUG. Will dissapear if FILE_DEBUGGING is undefined
00390    FileDebugCalcRoute::writeCostToFile('C',
00391                                        m_itemID,
00392                                        m_cost,
00393                                        cost,
00394                                        true,
00395                                        m_dest,
00396                                        "");
00397 #endif
00398    if ( theMap->getInfinity() != m_infinity ) {
00399       reset(theMap);
00400    }
00401    m_cost = cost;
00402 }

00524 inline RoutingConnection*
00525 RoutingNode::getFirstConnection( bool forward ) const
00526 {
00527    if (forward) {
00528       return m_forwardConn;
00529    } else {
00530       return m_backwardConn;
00531    }
00532 }
00533 
00534 inline RoutingConnection*
00535 RoutingNode::setFirstConnection( RoutingConnection* newFirst,
00536                                  bool forward )
00537 {
00538    RoutingConnection* retVal = getFirstConnection( forward );
00539    if ( forward ) {
00540       m_forwardConn = newFirst;
00541    } else {
00542       m_backwardConn = newFirst;
00543    }
00544    return retVal;
00545 }
00546 
00547 
00548 inline uint32
00549 RoutingNode::getNbrConnections() const
00550 {
00551    uint32 nbrConnections = 0;
00552    
00553    RoutingConnection *currentConnection = getFirstConnection();
00554    while (currentConnection) {
00555       nbrConnections++;
00556       currentConnection = currentConnection->getNext();
00557    }
00558    return nbrConnections;
00559 }

00586 inline
00587 void RoutingNode::addConnection( RoutingConnection* data, bool forward )
00588 {   
00589    if ( forward ) {
00590       data->setNext(m_forwardConn);
00591       m_forwardConn = data;
00592    } else {
00593       data->setNext(m_backwardConn);
00594       m_backwardConn = data;
00595    }
00596 }

00598 inline void
00599 RoutingNode::setMuch( uint32 itemID,
00600                       uint32 restrictions,
00601                       uint32 idx,
00602                       uint32 lat,
00603                       uint32 lon )
00604 {
00605    // From the old constructor
00606    m_forwardConn = NULL;
00607    m_backwardConn = NULL;
00608    
00609    m_infinity    = MAX_UINT8;
00610 
00611    // Now set stuff.
00612    m_lat = lat;
00613    m_lon = lon;
00614    m_itemID = itemID;
00615    m_nodeIndex = idx;
00616    m_restriction = restrictions;
00617 }
